segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the beginning of a message and to transmit the identifying number.
DTM, A segment to provide the date and time of the message.
QTY, A segment to indicate a quantity, such as the number of passengers on board the means of transport for a certain conveyance.
LOC, A segment to specify the position of the means of transport, e.g. by giving longitude and latitude coordinates of the vessel at sea.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify a reference applying to the whole message.

segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a reference, e.g. reference to previous message.
DTM, A segment to indicate a date and time related to the reference.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to indicate the details of the means of transport, and related locations and arrival dates and times.

segment.documentation: TDT, A segment to identify the means of transport (e.g. by Lloyd's Register number of a vessel, or by the license plate number of a truck).
DTM, A segment to indicate the estimated date and time of arrival and departure.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to specify locations related to the means of transport.

segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate a location relating to the means of transport, such as: - place or port of departure - next place or port of call.
DTM, A segment to specify date(s) and time(s) related to a location.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to identify a party and related contacts.

segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to identify a party's name, address and function.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to identify a contact and its communications related to the party.

segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department within the party.
COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to identify equipment related to the means of transport, and associated locations and dates and times.

segment.documentation: EQD, A segment to identify equipment, such as railcars.
LOC, A segment to specify the location of the equipment.
DTM, A segment to specify a date and time related to the equipment.
